reviewText: This movie would be alright except for the technical glitches in the disc itself. The coding between each of the chapters takes you back to the chapter menu. Which is really annoying. How can Video Asia live with themselves. They should have recalled this product and fixed it. So, if you lack patience stay away.

Cliff Lok battles his way through the obstacles of shaolin temple in order to recieve very important manuscripts, dealing with the emperor and his bloodline.  Amazing fight scenes, great styles, and an amazing final duel between Lok and Carter Wong that makes this good kick flic even better.  Even look for a cameo from superstar phlip kao.  Go get it.
